description:
Kagami is a serious guy who grew up in America till 13. He hates how Japanese students plays basketball but decides to challenge "Kiseki no Sedai" since he believes that "You cant live a life without challenging strong opponents".
He starts to hate kuroko since he plays extremely badly, and calls him a "bluff guy". but he changes his mind after seeing his impact in game.
He turns on and tries harder when people make fun out of him and call him weak and often laughs when he looses to a strong person.
even though he and Kuroko get along, he often starts a fight with him since Kuroko`s calm attitude gets on his nerves.
name: Kagami Taiga
